1_1PoA7YxWVZKoXWoD1PjdwByFqqCA8d2uqr.body: I'm looking for a "ZeroMirror" feature. Just enter the URL of an classic web page. It gets fetched with curl/wget/somwhat and is mirrored as a ZeroNet page. Entering the URL again only fetches changes and new content. Does anybody know of such an project already? Thanks !
